comments:
I tried to use the XML editor for editing a Java Data Objects (JDO) metadata
file. In order to do this I have added the .jdo extension in the Preference
window to General -> Content Types -> Text -> XML and also to the file
associations (General -> Editors -> File Associations ) for automatically using
the XML editor from WST. After opening a .jdo file the editor works fine,
including the syntax highlighting and the design view. However, the outline is
not updated and the exception listed below occurs:

This change is a bulk update of all _un_targeted, fixed, resolved bugs upon release of M5. This particular bug _might_ have been fixed earlier than M5. (Feel free to correct).

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP resolved bugs from the 1.0.x and 1.5.0 timeframe.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
